string.text: Contains maps, photos and a diskette
This is an ITEM test string
This is another ITEM test string

Powerful electronic lockpick. Strangely enough, it does not seem to be an all-purpose thieves' instrument. Rather, it seems to have been created with a specific electronic lock in mind and can't be used to override anything else.
Plastic document file. You'd need a degree in biology to understand a word of what it says.
A thick pile of scientific documents. Terms, formulas, and a number of diagrams
Worn manuscript in leather binding. Written by Strelok himself. Judging by the headings alone, it might explain some of the Zone's secrets.
Documents from the secret stash in Pripyat
A heavy wooden crate with the word "Explosives" written in several languages
Flash drive - convenient way to store and transfer information.
Flash drive - convenient way to store and transfer information.
Flash drive - convenient way to store and transfer information.
Flash drive - convenient way to store and transfer information.
Electronic key to the underground Lab X18.
Personal digital assistant. Indispensable in the Zone.
Personal digital assistant. Indispensable in the Zone.
Prototype developed by scientists to protect people from psi-emissions. Not adjusted.
Functional prototype developed by scientists to protect people from psi-emissions

GPS-beacon. In the Zone has appeared not so long ago, but enjoys wildly popular at the expense of versatility and affordable price. Initially, the prototype was introduced into "debt" for the demonstration and a deal to supply large quantities of these beacons. However, "random" missing a test version before the meeting of representatives from both sides gave a deep rift in the relationship with the supplier. Long and mutually beneficial relationship Voronin and Sakharov occurred here, can be very useful, and with the help of a local trader prototype beacon fell into the hands of scientists Field Laboratory, which is amber. He also has been redesigned and put on mass production for the needs of all the suffering. The original version did not survive due to a direct upgrade of a prototype. The upgraded version is different in a positive way because it allows us to digitally sign the beacons (Cyrillic, unfortunately, is not supported), and synchronize it with the PDA owner. On the basis of studies of protection against psionic effects, scientists have ensured that the beacon does not interference, and its detection by humans is virtually impossible. Given the fact that the GPS-beacon produced in-house laboratory Sakharov, the scientist and the prices more reasonable than those of dealers.
